name: tGOLD
description: tGOLD (TXAU) is a gold-backed token. Each tGOLD token is 1:1 backed by, and redeemable for 1 gram of 99.99% LBMA-accredited gold, held in fully insured and audited vaults. 50% of the rewards generated by tGOLD transactional fees are distributed to the holders of AurusX (AX).
